item.title: ‘Sushi lane musical action adventure’ Etrange Overlord launches March 26, 2026 in Japan for PS5, PS4, and Switch
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

The villainous young lady conquers Hell.

“Sushi lane musical action adventure” game Etrange Overlord will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on March 26, 2026 in Japan, publisher Broccoli and developer Gemdrops announced.

The Switch version will be available both physically and digitally. The standard edition will cost 8,580 yen, while the limited edition will cost 12,980 yen. The latter includes a special box, a three-disc original soundtrack and song collection, a one-disc theme song CD, an art book, and the hololive collaboration bonus downloadable content Sweetia costume “Tsunomaki Watame Ver.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Broccoli:

About

The villainous young lady conquers Hell.

Make full use of rotating “lanes” on the battle stage, items, and gimmicks, Sing, fight, and conquer Hell with the fallen duke’s daughter, Etrange! The genre is a “sushi lane musical action adventure”!

Key Features

  • Battle Stages Full of Gimmicks
    • A mysterious, rotating lane (commonly known as the Sushi Lane) appears on the battle stage.
    • In addition to helpful items, “something” flows through each stage, including bombs, machine guns, and gravity devices!
    • Defeat enemies, fully utilize the lane, and master a wide variety of missions and gimmicks!
  • “Way-to-Go” Customization to Fulfill Any Tactic
    • Not only can you strengthen over 10 playable characters, but you can also customize the “lane” effects on the stage.
    • Tune it to your own strategy and devour it to the core!
  • A Villainess’s Hell-Unifying Simulation
    • Lead a unique team of allies and attack, attack, and attack!
    • Send your allies into captured enemy territory to rob them,
    • and quell demon rebellions as you strive for a peaceful, happy life!
  • A Unique Musical Action Drama That Will Have You Laughing, Crying, and Singing Your Heart Out
    • Fully voiced event scenes and musical productions further enhance the outrageous story.
    • Sing along and join the Etrange army today!

Staff

  • Original Story: Kitayama Roman
  • Producer: Sohei Shinkawa (SuperNiche)
  • Character Design: Shinichiro Otsuka
  • Developer: Gemdrops
  • Publisher: Broccoli
  • Theme Song: “Etrange Overlord”
    • Lyrics: Roman Kitayama
    • Music: Noriyasu Agematsu (Elements Garden)
    • Singer: Watame Tsunomaki

Cast

  • Etrange (voiced by Kaori Mizuhashi)
  • Nekotaro (voiced by ???)
  • Hihi (voiced by Ryohei Arai)
  • Cook (voiced by Toru Inada)
  • Hyahaha (voiced by Momoka Udagawa)
  • Sweetia (voiced by Watame Tsunomaki)
  • Erit (voiced by Yuuki Ishikari)
  • Schwartz (voiced by Makoto Sahara)
  • Ignacio (voiced by Yuri Sakamoto)
  • Kel (voiced by Yuka Shinoda)
  • Bello (voiced by Yuri Sakamoto)
  • Sue (voiced by Hotori Asami)
  • Aria (voiced by Fubuki Shirakami)
  • Demon Lord Ahoborn (voiced by Nobuhiko Okamoto)
  • Jewel Butler (voiced by Takuma Terashima)
  • First Prince (voiced by Yusuke Tonozaki)
  • Angelina (voiced by Saya Aizawa)
  • …and more!

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/sushi-lane-musical-action-adventure-etrange-overlord-launches-march-26-2026-in-japan-for-ps5-ps4-and-switch

item.title: Mononoke no Kuni for PC launches in fall 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Playable at Tokyo Game Show 2025.

Otherworldly action adventure game Mononoke no Kuni will launch for PC via Steam in fall 2026, newly revealed publisher Happinet and developer Studio Lights announced. It will support English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Indonesian, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Polish, Russian, Swedish, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options. It will also be playable at Tokyo Game Show 2025, which will run from September 25 to 28 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A boy who defies fate and the bond with his loyal pup.

Taiki, a lonely boy, suddenly loses his only family—his beloved puppy, Musashi. Overcome with grief, he prays at a shrine, and Musashi is miraculously revived as an “Inubashira,” a divine canine. However, he is bound by mysterious cursed chains. A shrine maiden, Kushina, appears and tells Taiki, “If you gather the sacred relics from the Realm of Roots, you can save Musashi.”

Yet, this journey is not so simple. As they venture forth, an unexpected truth begins to unravel.

Set in a world where myths and yokai breathe life, this action-adventure follows a boy and his faithful pup as they challenge both fate and their unbreakable bond.

Three sacred relics, the whispers of yokai, and a hidden truth waiting to be uncovered.

And in the end, the final choice.

—Is the path you take to save Musashi truly the right one?

Key Features

  • Meet the Mononoke – Encounter unique Mononoke such as Nekomata, the cat spirit, Gama, the frog, Komi, the fox, and Mujina, the tanuki. Forge bonds with them, seek their aid, and battle against fearsome yokai to collect the sacred relics that will save Musashi.
  • A World of Painted Beauty – Explore the Mononoke Realm, a land brought to life with a painterly art style. Each region has its own distinct landscapes and atmosphere, creating a strange yet mesmerizing world.
  • An Adventure with Musashi – Your loyal companion Musashi, a puppy who once perished in the human world, must now fight to survive as a divine being. Work together to purify the yokai that threaten this land.
  • Interact with the Mononoke and Musashi – The Mononoke you meet have their own troubles and dilemmas. Assist them with Musashi by your side—perhaps good fortune awaits those who lend a helping hand!
  • Battle Against Ferocious Yokai – Face relentless yokai and cleanse them through purification battles with Musashi’s divine powers.
  • Bond with Musashi – Musashi, your tiny Shiba Inu companion, will always be by your side. When exhaustion sets in, take a moment to rest and bond with him. No matter what dangers await, as long as you’re together—nothing is impossible.

Watch a new trailer below. Visit the official website here.

Tokyo Game Show 2025 Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/mononoke-no-kuni-for-pc-launches-in-fall-2026

item.title: Game Boy Advance – Nintendo Classics adds Mr. Driller 2, Klonoa: Empire of Dreams on September 25
item.content:encoded:
• Switch
  • Switch 2

Two Bandai Namco titles join the service.

Game Boy Advance – Nintendo Classics will add Mr. Driller 2 and Klonoa: Empire of Dreams on September 25, Nintendo announced.

Here is an overview of each game, via their packaging:

Mr. Driller 2

Mr. Driller has heard the news of another mysterious outbreak of Blocks. The entire world will be buried! Armed with only a mighty drill, you must dig down to safety, scramble to reach air capsules, and rush to avoid falling blocks!

  • Game modes include Mission Driller, Endless Driller, and Time Attack Driller.
  • Also play as Anna Hottenmeyer… she’s full of attitude and ready to show Mr. Driller who the real hero is!
  • Play against friends by linking two Game Boy Advance systems using a Game Boy Advance Game Link Cable.

Klonoa: Empire of Dreams

Another dream, another adventure!

A grumpy Emperor suffering from insomnia has banned dreaming and imprisoned Klonoa for breaking the law. To prove his courage and win his freedom, Klonoa must defeat the monsters that are creating havoc throughout the empire. Help our hero in his most perilous journey yet and experience the all-new thrills!

  • Brand new exclusive adventure.
  • Conquer 40 incredible stages.
  • Solve devious brain teasers.
  • Classic game play includes double-jumping and hover-boarding.

Watch a trailer below.

September 2025 Game Updates: Game Boy Advance – Nintendo Classics

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/game-boy-advance-nintendo-classics-adds-mr-driller-2-klonoa-empire-of-dreams-on-september-25

item.title: Merry Bunny Garden launches October 9
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Tipsy-walking action game dated.

Bunny Garden spin-off tipsy-walking action game Merry Bunny Garden will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on October 9 for $19.99, developer qureate announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

After their glamorous night, the bunnies begin their dangerous journey home!

A spin-off of the Bunny Garden that charmed gentlemen across the world, is available now as an action game!

Control “woozy” cast members who can’t walk properly and return home avoiding dangers that await!

Your mission is to safely escort these “woozy” cast members home!

Story

Bunny Garden, a paradise where gentleman can relax after daily fatigue.

This is another story that occurs after business hours…

Kana, Rin, and Miuka had an amazing time at Bunny Garden tonight as per usual.

But it seems as though they had one too many drinks tonight.

So drunk to the point of their heads spinning, and not being able to stand straight…

But regardless of their condition, they had to go home.

They have to meet the gentlemen again tomorrow at Bunny Garden with smiles.

However, as if to shatter the girls’ hopes and dreams, tons of traps await on their way home!

Will Kana, Rin and Miuka be able to make it home safely tonight?!

System

  • Will the Woozy Cast Be Able to Return Home Safely?! – The player’s mission is to guide the staggering cast safely back home! Avoid all dangers lurking in the city at night, all while “woozy” where even walking straight is difficult! Steps, cars, bicycles and various other obstacles… Not to mention your clothes getting ripped… If you’re not careful it might be Game Over before you know it!! The cast’s survival all depends on you!
  • Happenings Await! – Crashing into trash cans and getting stuck, falling butt first into manholes… There are plenty of accidents on the way home! Overcome the troubles that await you and return the staggering cast home safely!

Characters

  • Kana (voiced by Mio Hoshitani)
  • Rin (voiced by Eri Suzuki)
  • Miuka (voiced by Masumi Tazawa)

Staff

  • Character Design: Waon Inui
  • Scenario: Takayoshi Muto (Synthese)
  • Producer: Yujiro Usuda

Watch a new trailer below. Visit the official website here.

Steam Gameplay



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/merry-bunny-garden-launches-october-9
